TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit Quaternion extends System.ValueType implements class System.IEquatable`1<valuetype System.Numerics.Quaternion>
Public Structure Quaternion Implements IEquatable(Of Quaternion)

summary.span: 表示用來編碼三維實體旋轉的向量。

span.span: Represents a vector that is used to encode three-dimensional physical rotations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 結構用來有效率地旋轉 （x，y，z） 相關的物件向量角度 theta 中，其中：The structure is used to efficiently rotate an object about the (x,y,z) vector by the angle theta, where: ``` w = cos(theta/2) ```

summary.span: 建立新的 物件。

span.span: Creates a new object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用目前的文化特性的慣例格式化數字的值在傳回的字串。The numeric values in the returned string are formatted by using the conventions of the current culture. 例如，EN-US 文化特性，傳回的字串可能會顯示為`{X:1.1 Y:2.2 Z:3.3 W:4.4}`。For example, for the en-US culture, the returned string might appear as `{X:1.1 Y:2.2 Z:3.3 W:4.4}`.
